author: mo_0x1
content: Does `eth_newBlockFilter` still just return `latest` or is there any change after `safe` and `finalized` became a thing? Talking out loud... "latest" should include blocks which may eventually be "safe" which may eventually be "finalized"... I'm guessing that `eth_newBlockFilter` would still return the "latest" blocks - whether they are ever eventually safe or finalized... but just checking if that dynamic has changed at all.

author: mo_0x1
content: Ah, scrolling up a bit it seems that it's still "latest", new heads
